statement.p: Explain why the vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} -6 \\ 4 \\ -6 \\ 5 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -5 \\ -4 \\ 5 \\ 3 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -16 \\ -4 \\ 4 \\ 11 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ 5 \\ 4 \\ 1 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} 6 \\ 10 \\ 8 \\ -6 \\ -8 \end{array}\right] are linearly dependent or linearly independent.

answer.p: The vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} -6 \\ 4 \\ -6 \\ 5 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -5 \\ -4 \\ 5 \\ 3 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -16 \\ -4 \\ 4 \\ 11 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ 5 \\ 4 \\ 1 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} 6 \\ 10 \\ 8 \\ -6 \\ -8 \end{array}\right] are linearly dependent .
